reviews.review_msg: This professor actually cares about his students. Very accessible and responsive. You may have assignments that are interesting and make you think about the application of the topic, such as trying to come up with a function that mimics the Mona Lisa smile etc. Simone makes you understand the topic, not just mechanically apply formulas & methods.

Simone is a good teacher, and he's very caring when it comes to his students understanding the material. My only issues are that he doesn't give enough examples, and his examples are always very basic. I wish we had seen more difficult examples because the final was quite hard. He's very nice, and he has a charming accent that was very pleasant

Good choice. His exam questions dont reflect the lecture content. Did bad on the midterm but progressed to better grade in the end, thanks to the past exams. He isnt available for specific questions. Lectures make sense upon review. Tip:Helpful practice questions(with sols) available on coursehero if you look well. All aside his lectures nice!
